content: counting the chain 3 as the first slip_stitch in the second loop of the previous motif chain 1 and turn make 1 single_crochet in the first st * chain 4 make 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 st* repeat *…* until the end of the row ending in 2 single_crochet you should have 4 loops cord chain 55 and then 3 more put a stitch marker in the 55th if you want make 3 double_crochet in the 55th chain chain 3 and slip_stitch back in the 55th st single_crochet in the back loop of each st back to the half motif make another cord in the same way starting from the second loop of the first motif weave in all ends wear and enjoy
